title: Origins: Lüdtwig Schmüdy
content: Today was the day it all began. I decided that I wanted to create an uplifting song about my experience with the book that changed my life. So I did. Found in the Pages was born, and I never wanted to stop making this kind of music. Songs that uplift, inspire, and share the light of Jesus Christ's Gospel. Click the link below to hear the song where it all started.

title: Walking in His Name
content: My first album released to Spotify! This album is all about Jesus Christ and His gospel, what He has done for us, what my experiences serving Him, and general experiences about coming to Him. I hope these songs inspire you as much as their messages inspired me. Click the link below to listen to the full album on Spotify.
